issue.title: [Java] Refactor null slot verification onto a single method in the parent class
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5305](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5305). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4288 is checked in there is an opportunity to refactor the code to one place instead of having the same logic across all vector classes.

comments.body:
